program main

implicit none

integer :: N, i

integer :: count_odd

real(kind=8) :: ratio

! Read N

read(*,*) N

! Allocate arrays

allocate(x_array(N), u_array(N))

! Read N lines

do i = 1, N

   read(*,*) x_array(i), u_array(i)

! Compute sum_total

      sum_total = sum_total + x_array(i)*380000.0d0

   end if

end do

! Compute count_odd

count_odd = int( (sum_total / 2.0d0) + 0.5d0 )

! Compute ratio

ratio = real(count_odd, kind=8) / sum_total

! Output with 10 decimal places

print '(F0.10)', ratio

deallocate(x_array, u_array)

end program main
